-- Uses to lock MQ and BTCH, see R.S.
@OMQ255 is called 2 times for different MQ types and for every MQ type
separate permissions and task titles have to be fetched
1. OMQ255 = How to handle legal payments
... lock not possible because batch is locked by an other user
... lock not possible because locked by another user

ExpSyntax.val: IF (NOT (Stat (0,'C'MODE)) AND InStr ({1,7},'M')>0 AND ({0,26}='' OR {0,26}=User (0)) AND ({0,27}='' OR {0,27}=User (0)),'TRUE'LOG,'FALSE'LOG)

Text.val: -- Delete MQ256 if payment is handled (=closed)
-- If key 'Esc' pressed by USER or he starts an other program
-- directly over the menue out of this program, the following BLOCK
-- will be executed --> -- Ask USER for confirmation if he changed
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to save changes
-- Store one BDPD row with info who/when the reply is entered
-- Finally store MQ256 for payment department
... and delete the curent MQ255 line
... store one BDPD row for every extracted string
